attributes.action: Proportional Representation in Parliament in return for a 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The British Public have very narrowly voted to leave the EU. It is widely agreed that this has come about because of a rejection of the political class who have, for many years, ignored the views of a large proportion of the population. 

This referendum would propose 2 questions: 

1. Would you accept a repeat referendum on EU membership in return for a CAST IRON guarantee of proportional representation in Parliament?

2. Do you wish Britain to remain a member of the EU?
attributes.background: This petition would require the UK Parliament offer the British Public a CAST IRON guarantee or Proportional Representation in return for a second EU Referendum. I believe this would offer us the opportunity to correct the inequalities which have fractured this country.

rejection.details: If you would like to start a petition asking for a second referendum with different questions, we could accept a petition on that.
